Text: The King and I (1956 film):  That novel in turn was based on memoirs written by Anna Leonowens, who became school teacher to the children of King Mongkut of Siam in the early 1860s.

Text: The King and I (1956 film):  Leonowens' stories were autobiographical, although various elements of them have been called into question.
